item.title: Are my labels there? Searching among label values on Stata
item.description: The problem This brief post answer the question my orignal google search How to check if a value is contained into a variable on stata? Imagine we have a problem where we need to check if a string is contained into the labels of another variable. Let’s start with a minimal example using sysuse auto and the variable foreing which is the only one with labels already in place.
